data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Model theory studies the models of various formal theories. Here a theory ____ a ____ of ____ in a particular ____ logic ____ signature, while a model ____ a ____ that ____ a ____ interpretation ____ the ____. Model theory is closely related to universal algebra and algebraic geometry, although the methods of model theory focus more on logical considerations than those fields.
data.partBlankContent: Model theory studies the models of various formal theories. Here a theory i_ a s__ of form____ in a particular for___ logic a__ signature, while a model i_ a stru_____ that gi___ a conc____ interpretation o_ the the___. Model theory is closely related to universal algebra and algebraic geometry, although the methods of model theory focus more on logical considerations than those fields.
data.answer: 模型理论研究各种形式理论的模型。在这里，理论是一组具有特定形式逻辑和签名的公式，而模型是对理论进行具体解释的结构。模型理论与普适代数和代数几何密切相关，尽管模型理论的方法更多地关注于逻辑方面的考虑而不是这些领域。
